markdownRemark.html: In July 2016, I volunteered to present Container-less Java Services at Next Century’s developer tech talk series. After working with Akka’s “microkernel” and deploying a web project to Heroku for school, I became increasingly interested in Java services which run without the aid of an app server, so I was happy to share this with my colleagues. The deck is available on speakerdeck.com/gilday/container-less-java-services.

frontmatter.title: Tech Talk on Container-less Java Services
Completed M.S. Computer Science at JHU
